resources.string: Please enter IP Address and Port number

Usage: 
 Server should click Server button and select port (optional, if not selected value will be 25000) and click Start.
 Client should click Client and insert info from server which will be displayed on "server" phone (e.g. IP: 192.168.1.2 Port: 25000) and click "Connect"
 
 There is two options for using this app, using actual WiFi or Hotspot. 
 
 Using actual WiFi: 
 Both device need to be on same WiFi, who will be Server and who will be Client is not important. 
 
 Using Hotspot: 
 One device need to turn on Hotspot, other one need to connect to it. 
 It is important that device that is connected to Hotspot is Server, and one who is sharing Hotspot is Client

Application is used for Voice communication between two devices in offline mode (without internet).
 It is utilising actual WiFi or Hotspot. Currently Application support P2P (Just two device).
 App is in Beta still.
